div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
aprilis Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo decimo

Eodem die Compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem Curie quod Robertus Kennertj
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Jacobi Kennertj patris suj burgensis burgi

The saide day Williame lindesay as procurator to Agnes scherar' his Spous' oblist
him be his hande and gudis that the said Agnes sale hald ferme and stabile ale
and quhatsumeuir thingis he dois in hir' nayme anent the gudis of airschip cla
mit and persevit be Jonhne brabnir in the nayme of the ayr of vmquhile Wat
philp

The said' day Williame lindesay as forspekar and caucioner for agnes scherar'
his Spous allegit ale the gudis clamit be Johne brabnir In the name of
the ayr of vmquhile Walter philp as airschip testat gudis herfor the
prouest and balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to the said' Johne to
preiwe the gudis clamit be him gudis of airschip and warnit the said William
to comper and her' the said preuis producit admittit and suorne et cetera

The saide day It was fundin and Sufficientlie preuit that malcome nachtj sale
refunde and pay tile Androw meldrum vij s' and vii d' for thome atkin
within terme of law

The saide day it was Sufficientlie preuit and fundin that malcum nachtj sale content
and deliuer to malcum nachtj xxij elnez' of Smale quhit for money pait to
Alexander gray youngar

The saide day the prouest and balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Jonet
traile tile ansuer to Robert of Kennertj for his gudis of airschipe clamit
be him Ande discernit the copy of his bile gevin apone the clame of the said
airschip to the said' Jonet one hir expens' Atour the saide Robert for him self
and sere Androw Colisone procuratour to mastir Dauid menyeis Complenyeit that the said
Jonet Impedit and Stopit him to byg apone the pece of land' nerrast his avn'
lande one the west part set to him in feoferme be the said mastir Dauid Ande the
saide Jonet accusit tharapon' denyit that euire scho Stopit him tharintile and said'
scho was content that he biggit for it was bot ane pece of ane ald' stabile that
he wald' big apoun' and was Content that ye bigit for eftir hir deces' ale the land
was his avne

The said' day Robert scrogis tuk to preiwe one friday that next cumis that Dauid straloche
gaf him ane franche Crovne in part of pament of xxiiij s' aucht to him
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio dicti burgi xvo die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The said day coppin memen skipper fand androw Waus burges of abirdene souerte that quhat
skaithe that James collsione Wole throu or throu his that the said James mycht prewe
he suld recompens' him tharof sustenit in the said skipperis defalt or in the defalt of his
schip quhat that the said James mycht prewe the said skipper' suld recompens It to the said James

The said day coppin meman skipper persewit be his awneris for the quhisile that he haid
and the said awneris gif the said skipper in his aitht and in robert hillis gif the said quhisyle
was broucht with the fracht of the schip quhilkis riply awisit deponit laitht in ane
wate that the rakile of the said quhisyle was boucht with the fraucht of the said schip
and nocht ellis
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day ale fre broustaris of this burghe' was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' thomas chamer forspekar for brekin of commone ordinance in Selling
of aile derrar thane It was set that is to say for viij d' the galloun' quhar
It was set to vj d' the galloun' and for selling of aile for viij d' quhar
It was nocht wortht vj d' Ande for Selling of aile or it be cunnyt
and Set for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in the amerciamentis of the court
and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day ale vnfre broustaris was conuict' be the saide assis for Selling
of Sex penny aile quhar it was set to iiij d' et cetera and for selling of
aile for vj d' that was nocht wortht iiij d'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die aprilis
anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes arthour fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordanit
magistrum Johannem marschele et Duncanum fif coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores
actores factores dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam legittimam
potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum georgium
talyour pro summa xiij li' vj s' et viij d' secundum tenorem actum precedens agendum defendendum
Calumpniandum Ac in omnibus aliis querelis Causis et actionibus ipsum tangens
in vberiora forma procuratorij qua fieri poterit promittens de Rato et grato
Cum ceteris clausulis et terminis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis

The said day Thome menyeis follouit Dauid straloche for xxiiij s' iij d' to
compt and rekning for paking of certane salmond pertening to my lord of Aberdene
and allegeit that he was oblist be the fatht of his bodie for the pament of the
samyn tharfor the said Dauid declinit the court and allegeit that he aucht nocht
to ansuer to the said thomas becaus he follovit him be his fath and protestit
quhat the bailyeis did' tharto suld' turne him to na preiudice

Eodem die Andreas lousone fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistros Johannem
baidienaght and Daiud lousone suum filium suos procuratores Irreouocabiles actores
et factores ad prosequendum Dauid mar pro iniusta detencione vnius horrej Ac in omnibus aliis
suos actionibus quibuscumque Promittens se Ratum gratum firmum et stabile in vberiora
forma procuratorij

The said day ser richerd andirsone and thomas lousone oblist thame be the fath of thar bodijs
to stand' and abid' at the deliuerance of James colisone and Johnne blak anent al compt
and reknyng betuix thaim

The said day Thomas moir grantit him awand' to Johnne Abderdour
viij hiddis half xiij hidis and half cow hiddis and vj quarteris of fusteane
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day Johnne of mar and patrik lesly bailyeis chargit Agnes scherar
the relict of vmquhile Waltir philp to deliuer to Johnne brabner the
ayrschip grantit be his in bill in continent to the said Johnne'

The said day Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar' at command of patry leslie bailyhe
chargit Johnne colisone bailye to pay iij s' vj d' to Johnne arthour within
terme of law of the rest of ane gretar' Some eftir the tenour of the Act
gane obefor et cetera

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that nixt Cumis to Robert Kennertj
to preiwe the gudis of airschip clamit and persewit be him haldin be Jonet traile
fra him be deces' of James Kennertj his fadir and ordanit him to bring his preuis to
the said' day Ande the saide Jonet tile ansuer to him tharupoun' Ande atour thai
ordanit the saide Robert tile ansuer to the said' Jonet in the thingis scho
has to say to him and discernit the copy of the bile of airschipe clamit be
the said Robert to the said' Jonet one hir' expens'

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that thomas
ridale hede preuit Sufficientlie that Symon' ellone is aving to him xxxti s' for
vj barrellis of vnyonis' and aw to pay him the samyn within terme of law for the
quhilk he was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera and aw aw to pay the saide xxxtj s'
and that was gevin for dome

The said day Comperit thomas byris and schew how he was warnit to comper tile
ansuer at the Instance of Richerde litstar and offerit redy tharto and becaus' the saide
richerd' comperit nocht to follou him he protestit to be quyt of his challance
quhile he be new perseuit

add.foreign: minister domus Sancte trinitatis et myln'

div.p:
The saide day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for dome
that frer Jonhne arnot minister of the trinite place of abirdene hede Sufficientlie
preuit That Jonhne of myln' bocht ane j hors fra him for xxxvi s' and
aw to resaue the saide hors and pay the saide Some to the saide minister

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo secundo die
mensis aprilis Anno dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The said day georg tailyeour lauchfullie callit warnit and nocht comperit till ansuer
to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne arthour for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of xiij li' vj s' viij d' tharfor the bailyeis chargit Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar
to pas' and tak ane distres' of the said george and lat it to borgh' again gif it be askit
and war him to comper this day xv dais to ansuer to the said borgh' as ferd'
day of process' and gif the said day be nocht lachfull to the nixt court day lachfull
thareftir folloving

The said day bessy Bisset was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androw fif forspekar
for the strublance of Johnne colisone bailye in word' for the quhilkis shco
was in amerciament of the court and til amend as law wil and forber in tyme tocum And' the
amendis of the said tribulance was referrit to the prouost and consal on friday that nixt cummys

The said Bessy bisset was conuict be ane suorne assis' Duncan Colisone
forspekar for the tribulance of Wilyeame King cordoner for the quhilkis scho
was in amerciament of the court and til amend' as law wil and forber in tyme tocum
And' the saide Wilyeame was maid quyt of al tribulance of the said bessy
And the amendis tharof referrit to the prouost and bailyeis on' friday that nixt cummys

The said day Robert Kennerty one that ane part and Jonet traile his gud modir
one that vthir referrit thame to certane frendis to be chosin be bath thar consentis
anent the gudes of airschip clamyt be the said robert at the said Jonet to
commone tharapone betuix this and friday vnder houp of concord in siclik forme
and effect as it stud obefor And gif the said frendis cane nocht aggre thame
betuix this and thane athir of thame to haue priuileg and thar caus' aganis
vdiris

The said day Wilyeame stile merchand man comperit in Jugment In presens of alexander
hay befor patry lesly bailye and offerit him reddy tile vnderlie the decisioun'
of ane assis of his nychtbouris befor his Jug ordinar in ale actionis caus'
and querellis that the said alexander had to say to him Protestand' that quhat the
said alexander did' tharto or persewit him befor ony vthir Jugis sen' he was
thar til vndirly his ordinar' Jugis suld' turne him to na preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die aprilis anno
quo supra

The said' day It was Sufficientlie preuit that Jonhne fechat
is avand' to Canny murray viij s' scottis money for iiij eln' of clath quhilkis he promittit
to pay to hir within terme of law

The said' day the balyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis to Robert Waus to bring
his procuratorij quhilk he has of Robert prat to resaue the annuele of sere Androw Colison'
land' et cetera

The said day It was deliuerit be the Prouost and Counsaile that Androu
mortymer sal desist and ses' fra the biging of the pece of Inland vnder
the bak star of the land' of vmquhile thomas lesly liand' in the castelgat
one the northt part of the samyne gat and tak dovne the thing that he
has biggit one the said ground' but preiudice till ony partj havand'
richt tharto in continent but delay

The said day the prouost and bailyeis assignit this day Aucht dais
to ser Johnne ruthirfurd one that ane part and Wilyeame makesone myllar
one that vthir part to bring thar preiffis and richtis quhilkis thai haue
and wil wse anent the clames and debatis movit betuix thaim anent
part of landis clamit be the said ser Johnne Jol ruthirfurd to pertene to his
tak of Rubislaw

The said Wilyeame makesone myllar at the Justice myllis
said that Dauid syme durst say na thing bot that ser Johne ruthirfurd'
baid' him say

Curia Balliuorum de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die
aprilis Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day mag stile grantit hir awand' to mathou branche xvj s'
for certan' vngeyeonis bocht fra him quhilkis the bailyeis chargit hir to
pay within terme of law

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that Williame brechene hed' falyeit in his preiwe quhar' he tak to prewe
that Androw Durty hed' Cossit his gowne for his gowne for the quhilkis
the saide Wiliame was in Amerciament of the Court and the said' William aw to restor'
the said' gowne agan to to the said' Williame Androw et cetera

Eodem die thomas chamer Jacobus Colisone thomas Waus Duncanus colisone Dauid andirsone
patricius chernsid' Malcomus crag Alanus litstar Dauid fynne Richardus Waus Dauid straloche
gilbertus litster Duncanus fif Johannes arthour and Dauid mar' Junior Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannis
Ratre pater Johannis Ratre Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de quadam terra anteriore et Interiore Jacente in frontali parte parte vici castri versus orieam inter terram quondam
Roberti glenmaluyn ex australi ex vna et terram thome craufurde et boreali partibus ab altera et de croftis
sine terris de gallouhillis et cetera et de vno annuo Redditu xiij s' et quatuor denariorum de terra Willelmi
colp Jacente in vico Nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Willelmi gray versus oriens et terram
Johannis malysone v versus Occidens et quod dictus Johannes est legittimis et propinquior heres dicti quondam patris
sui de dictis terris et annuo Redditu et cetera Igitur dederunt Johannj mar balliuo in mandatis
prefatum Johannem ad huismodi terras Cognosceret scilicet sasinam habendam huismodi Croftorum et annuj Redditus tradideret secundum
tenorem Cartarum suarum et laudabiles consuetudines burgorum
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirden tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The said' day margaret hay the spous' of gilbert tulidef was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' Duncan fyf forspekar for tribulance of marioun' Kintor spous' to Jonhne raburne
for the quhilkis scho was in Amerciament of the court and tile amend' as law wyle and forber
in tyme to Cum and that was gevin for dome Ande the said' marrion' was quyt of ale
tribulance of the said' margaret Ande the assis' refferrit the Amendis herof to the prouest and
Consale

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Sexto die mensis
Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johnne malisone was conuict' be ane suorne aassis' Androw fif
forspekar for the of ane lax in the watter pertening till
alexander blinsele thomas Waus and alexander menyeis ffor the quhilkis he was in
amerciament of the court And aw to restor the said lax and forber in tyme
tocum And the said alexander in the name of thome Angousone his man
was conuict' be the said assis' for the wranguis' fischeing and takin of ane lax
in the wattir pertening to the said Johnne and his marrowis ffor the quhilkis
he was in amerciament of the court and' aucht to restor the said lax and'
forber in tyme tocum

The said day Thomas gregory and thome angousone was conuict' be
the said assis' for the reving of thomas Patry lesleis netht for the
quhilkis ilkane of thame was In amerciament of the court and aucht
till amend as law will and forber In tyme tocum

The said day Androu mortymer lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit for tribulance of Johnne of mar was in amerciament of the
court

The said day Johnne arthour was maid quyt be ane suorne assis'
Johnne cullan forspekar for tribulance of Alexander menyis

The said day Johnne of cullan Wilyeam futhes Duncan Colisone thomas Waus
Wilyam Wormet Dauid Steuart James strathachin Adam fif Robert Waus cuh
bert Jhonstone Androw meldrum henry reid' Johnne ramsay Dauid straloche
and Johnne craik burges of the said burgh' chosin and suorne in ane assis'
to decerne and decid the borgh' fundin be Johne arthour one georg talyour
for the wranguis withhalding fra him of xiij li' vj s' viij d' of lent money
and penny worthis the richtis ressonis witnes and preiffis of bath the said partijs
herd sene and vnderstandin ordanit and deliuerit that the said georg talyeour
sal cum to the said Johnne of Cullannis hous' this day be thre houris eftir
noyne or tharby befor him and tua or iij of the said assis' and compt and
rekin with the said Johnne arthour he bringand his covnt buk with him And gif
thai happin nocht till aggre thai ordand' the said partijs to comper one friday
that nixt cummys within the tolbutht of the said burgh' befor the bailyeis And the
said' assis' sal deliuer anent the said borgh' quhilk thai haue continewit
to the said day

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Maij Anno et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day georg tailyeour grantit him avand' to Johnne arthour x li' v s' vij d'
quhilk

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis assignit the xv day of the monetht of maij
Instant to Johnne arthour to preive quhat somez' of money georg tailyeour is
awand' him atour the said some of x li' v s' vij d' And to the said georg to preve
the condicioun' that he allegis that the said Johnne promittit to put him and his wif
in the land' that the said georgis duellis In eftir the tenour of the said georgis writ
producit In Jugment tharapone
